mapper.select: -- JdbcInfoDao.selectJdbcInfoList SELECT A.CD_GRP ,A.CD_GRP_NM ,A.CD_ID ,A.CD_ID_NM ,A.CD ,A.CD_NM ,A.CD_DESC ,B.CD_NM AS CD_TY_CD ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.UPD_DTM ,A.UPD_USR_ID FROM TDACM00060 A LEFT JOIN TDACM00060 B ON B.CD_ID = 'CD_TY_CD' AND B.CD = A.CD_TY_CD WHERE (#{comboJdbcInfoId} = 'ALL' AND ( A.CD_GRP LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD_GRP_NM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD_ID LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD_ID_NM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD_NM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD_DESC LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') ) ) OR (#{comboJdbcInfoId} = 'CD_GRP' AND A.CD_GRP LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%')) OR (#{comboJdbcInfoId} = 'CD_GRP_NM' AND A.CD_GRP_NM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%')) OR (#{comboJdbcInfoId} = 'CD_ID' AND A.CD_ID LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%')) OR (#{comboJdbcInfoId} = 'CD_ID_NM' AND A.CD_ID_NM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%')) OR (#{comboJdbcInfoId} = 'CD' AND A.CD LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%')) OR (#{comboJdbcInfoId} = 'CD_NM' AND A.CD_NM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%')) OR (#{comboJdbcInfoId} = 'CD_DESC' AND A.CD_DESC LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%')) ORDER BY A.CD_TY_CD,A.CD_ID, A.CD

-- JdbcInfoDao.selectJdbcInfoRegList SELECT A.CD_ID_NM ,A.CD_ID_HNM ,A.CD_ID_GRP_NM ,A.CD ,A.CD_NM ,A.CD_HNM ,A.CD_DESC ,A.CD_TY_CD ,A.CD_STS_CD ,A.REG_DTM AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.UPD_DTM AS UPD_DTM ,A.UPD_USR_ID FROM TDACM00060 A WHERE A.CD_ID_HNM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD_NM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD_HNM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD_ID_GRP_NM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') ORDER BY A.CD_TY_CD,A.CD_ID_NM, A.CD

-- JdbcInfoDao.selectJdbcInfoExtList SELECT A.CD_ID_NM ,A.CD ,B.CD_NM ,A.CD_PARAM1_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM1 ,A.CD_PARAM2_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM2 ,A.CD_PARAM3_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM3 ,A.CD_PARAM4_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM4 ,A.CD_PARAM5_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM5 ,A.CD_PARAM6_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM6 ,A.CD_PARAM7_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM7 ,A.CD_PARAM8_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM8 +` ,A.REG_DTM AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.UPD_DTM AS UPD_DTM ,A.UPD_USR_ID FROM TDACM00061 A, TDACM00060 B WHERE A.CD_ID_NM = B.CD_ID_NM AND A.CD = B.CD AND ( A.CD_ID_NM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') ) AND B.CD_STS_CD = '03' ORDER BY A.CD_ID_NM, A.CD

-- JdbcInfoDao.selectJdbcInfoExtRegList SELECT A.CD_ID_NM ,A.CD ,A.CD_PARAM1_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM1 ,A.CD_PARAM2_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM2 ,A.CD_PARAM3_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM3 ,A.CD_PARAM4_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM4 ,A.CD_PARAM5_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM5 ,A.CD_PARAM6_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM6 ,A.CD_PARAM7_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM7 ,A.CD_PARAM8_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM8 ,A.CD_PARAM9_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM9 ,A.REG_DTM AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.UPD_DTM AS UPD_DTM ,A.UPD_USR_ID FROM TDACM00061 A WHERE A.CD_ID_NM LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') OR A.CD LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%') ORDER BY A.CD_ID_NM, A.CD

-- JdbcInfoDao.selectJdbcInfoExt SELECT A.CD_ID_NM ,A.CD ,B.CD_NM ,B.CD_HNM ,B.CD_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM1_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM1 ,A.CD_PARAM2_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM2 ,A.CD_PARAM3_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM3 ,A.CD_PARAM4_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM4 ,A.CD_PARAM5_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM5 ,A.CD_PARAM6_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM6 ,A.CD_PARAM7_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM7 ,A.CD_PARAM8_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM8 ,A.CD_PARAM9_DESC ,A.CD_PARAM9 ,A.REG_DTM AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.UPD_DTM AS UPD_DTM ,A.UPD_USR_ID FROM TDACM00061 A, TDACM00060 B WHERE A.CD_ID_NM = B.CD_ID_NM AND A.CD = B.CD AND A.CD_ID_NM = #{CD_ID_NM} AND A.CD = (CASE WHEN #{CD} IS NULL THEN A.CD ELSE #{CD} END) AND B.CD_NM = (CASE WHEN #{CD_NM} IS NULL THEN B.CD_NM ELSE #{CD_NM} END) ORDER BY A.CD_ID_NM, A.CD

-- JdbcInfoDao.selectJdbcInfoRegList SELECT A.CD_ID_NM ,A.CD_ID_HNM ,A.CD_ID_GRP_NM ,A.CD ,A.CD_NM ,A.CD_HNM ,A.CD_DESC ,A.CD_TY_CD ,A.CD_STS_CD ,B.CD_PARAM1_DESC ,B.CD_PARAM1 ,B.CD_PARAM2_DESC ,B.CD_PARAM2 ,B.CD_PARAM3_DESC ,B.CD_PARAM3 ,B.CD_PARAM4_DESC ,B.CD_PARAM4 ,B.CD_PARAM5_DESC ,B.CD_PARAM5 ,B.CD_PARAM6_DESC ,B.CD_PARAM6 ,B.CD_PARAM7_DESC ,B.CD_PARAM7 ,B.CD_PARAM8_DESC ,B.CD_PARAM8 ,B.CD_PARAM9_DESC ,B.CD_PARAM9 FROM TDACM00060 A LEFT JOIN TDACM00061 B ON A.CD_ID_NM = B.CD_ID_NM AND A.CD = B.CD WHERE A.CD_ID_NM = #{CD_ID_NM} AND A.CD_STS_CD = '03' -- 승인 ORDER BY A.CD_TY_CD,A.CD_ID_NM, A.CD
mapper.delete: -- JdbcInfoDao.deleteJdbcInfo DELETE FROM TDACM00060 WHERE CD_ID_NM = #{CD_ID_NM} AND CD = #{CD}
-- JdbcInfoDao.deleteJdbcInfoExt DELETE FROM TDACM00061 WHERE CD_ID_NM = #{CD_ID_NM} AND CD = #{CD}
